数据库中的数据在 `lab1_data` 中。

实验代码在 `my_company.sql` 中。

把四个数据库的结果打印出来，方便查看：

```sql
mysql> SELECT * FROM department;
+------------+-----+--------------------+--------------+
| dname      | dno | mgrssn             | mgrstartdate |
+------------+-----+--------------------+--------------+
| 甲类一车间 | A01 | 131181199901012113 | 2020-10-10   |
| 甲类二车间 | A02 | 131181199902102123 | 2023-01-25   |
| 乙类一车间 | B01 | 131181199903012133 | 2022-05-06   |
| 乙类二车间 | B02 | 131181199904022143 | 2021-09-11   |
| 研发部     | C10 | 131181199905032153 | 2022-06-09   |
+------------+-----+--------------------+--------------+
```

```sql
mysql> SELECT * FROM project;
+-------+-----+-----------+------+
| pname | pno | plocation | dno  |
+-------+-----+-----------+------+
| SQL   | P1  | S市       | A01  |
| PPA   | P2  | S市       | A01  |
| D3T   | P3  | D市       | B01  |
| ABZ   | P4  | S市       | A01  |
| QC    | P5  | D市       | B01  |
| PG    | P6  | P市       | A02  |
| OT9   | P7  | D市       | B01  |
| 5E    | P8  | D市       | B01  |
| SSP   | P9  | T市       | B02  |
| WW    | PZ  | W市       | C10  |
+-------+-----+-----------+------+
```

```sql
SELECT ename FROM employee
WHERE essn IN (
	SELECT essn FROM works_on AS wo, project AS pj
	WHERE(
	    wo.pno = pj.pno AND wo.hours > 0 AND pj.pname = "SQL"
	)
);
```
